entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:54 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:54 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
